title: Guild Trainer
name: Freya
description: Raised amid the Brigands Brigade by Thorne himself, Freya combines her mentor's strategic mind with a fierce independence. Now the guild's master trainer, she transforms recruits into survivors using lessons learned from both sides of the hamlet's violent history.
history: Orphaned during the Brigade's campaign against the hamlet, Freya found an unlikely guardian in Thorne, who trained her in combat from an early age. When he chose to break from Vvulf's leadership, she followed without hesitation, her loyalty to her mentor exceeding any ties to the Brigade. Her unique perspective - having grown from victim to aggressor to defender - shapes her unorthodox but effective training methods.
summary: guild_trainer (Freya) -- A fierce and adaptable Guild Trainer, raised by Thorne, who transforms recruits into survivors using her unique blend of strategic and unorthodox combat methods.
notes: Wields every weapon with proficiency, but favors the axe
Her harsh training methods betray her brigand upbringing
